p: To a solution of compound 6 (0.005 mol) and ammonium acetated (0.5gm) in glacial acetic acid (5 mL), ethyl acetoacetoacetate or acetylacetone (0.005 mol) was added. The mixture was heated under reflux for 4 h.; after completion of the reaction and cooling, the product was poured onto ice cold water, dried, and recrystallized from the suitable solvent to give compounds 7 and 8.
